alert.note: Alert for Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, northern Sumter and north central Hernando Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Homosassa Springs to near Wildwood. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Wildwood, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Inverness Airport, Black Diamond, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Lake Panasoffkee, Coleman, Arbor Lakes, Lecanto, Leisure Acres, Inverness Highlands, Adamsville, Heatherwood, Citrus Hills and Gospel Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
